About the Company: Grauer & Weil (India) Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of virtually the entire range of metal finishing chemicals, as well as all types of equipment and plating plants made to international specifications and supplied to exacting standards the world over.The company also offers a wide range of plating plants and equipments, from conventional stand-alone units, to fully automatic program controlled systems; integrated with effluent treatment, waste water recovery and re-circulation procedures. Be it for general plating, plating of printed circuit boards, continuous plating lines or pre-treatment/cleaning machines, their roduction programs can meet all needs for surface treatment. They also manufacture Lubricants..The company also in the business activities of Paints, Chemical, Engineering, Shoppertainment, Oils & Lubricants.
